props.name: src
props.docblock:
An icon component to render. Example import of a Paragon icon component:
`import { Check } from '@edx/paragon/dist/icon';`

description.text:
An icon component to render. Example import of a Paragon icon component:
`import { Check } from '@edx/paragon/dist/icon';`

props.name: alt
props.docblock:
Alt text for your icon. For best practice, avoid using alt text to describe
the image in the IconButton. Instead, we recommend describing the function
of the button.

description.text:
Alt text for your icon. For best practice, avoid using alt text to describe
the image in the IconButton. Instead, we recommend describing the function
of the button.

props.name: invertColors
props.docblock: Changes icon styles for dark background

description.text: Changes icon styles for dark background

props.name: iconClassNames
props.docblock: Extra class names that will be added to the icon

description.text: Extra class names that will be added to the icon
